name: Simple about:newtab page: MLP background
description:
Very simple and transparent CSS extension for your about:newtab.
Ideal when about:newtab is your homepage.
Allows you to easily swap out the background image if you don't like the default Twilight Sparkle.

user.name: Dawnflash
user.about: I am a casual programmer, studying IT at university and doing web development at the same time.

additional_info:
Features reduced opacity cells, natural alignment on widescreen monitors.
Looks good with Firefox Nightly and normal alike.
The code is simple enough to allow you to replace parts of it, like the background or opacity levels.
Removes the annoying search bar. Press Ctrl+L to search, of course.
No more need for addons to modify your newtab page!

MY TIP: replace the background URL in the code with a local image if you want the theme to work offline.

WARNING: Developed on Nightly channel of Firefox and works with regular Firefox from version 41.0.2 up as-is.
If the style's background and/or margin offsets are NOT working for you, on line 4 and 10 replace
"#newtab-vertical-margin{" and "#newtab-horizontal-margin{" with their respective alternatives in comments.
This is a backwards compatibility feature!
Read before reporting!

Thanks and enjoy :)
